name: Bad Request Credentials
statusMessage:
Step [User enters incorrect Username {string} or incorrect Password {string} and RememberMe {string}] is defined with 4 parameters at 'com.epam.api.stepdefinitions.AuthenticationSteps.authenticateWithInvalidCredentials(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String)'.
However, the gherkin step has 3 arguments:
 * ""
 * "admin"
 * "true"
Step text: User enters incorrect Username "" or incorrect Password "admin" and RememberMe "true"
